text: one goat for a purification offering;
descendants of Besai, descendants of the Meunites, descendants of the Nephusites,
They answered and said to him, “You are not from Galilee also, are you? Look and see that no prophet arises from Galilee.”
Which of the prophets did your ancestors not persecute? They put to death those who foretold the coming of the righteous one, whose betrayers and murderers you have now become.
